definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: I am a dauber in clay.
sentences.chinese: 我是個在泥塗裏亂畫的傢伙。

sentences.english: Many people are still in the habit of wring silly things in public places.
sentences.chinese: 許多人仍然有在公共場所亂塗亂畫的壞習慣。

sentences.english: You are not to scribble on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 不准你在牆上亂塗亂畫。

sentences.english: Police reportedly also questioned school staff about the slogan-writing graffiti incident.
sentences.chinese: 據聞警方還就亂塗亂畫標語事件向學校職員詢問。

sentences.english: People pay you to paint their logos onto your cow.
sentences.chinese: 人們付錢給你，可以在牛身上亂畫他們的商標。

sentences.english: Sarah is doodling on a piece of paper.
I often doodle when I'm on the phone.
sentences.chinese: 我打電話時常常信手亂畫。

sentences.english: Were you the type who doodled during class?
sentences.chinese: 你以前有在課堂上亂塗亂畫過嗎？
在牆上亂寫亂畫是不對的。

sentences.english: Thoughtless boy have deface the desk by marking on them.
sentences.chinese: 輕率的男孩子們在桌面上亂畫而把桌面弄壞了。

sentences.english: Don’t scrawl all over the wall.
I have tons of journals filled with nothing but scribble.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多日記本什麼都沒寫，除了亂寫亂畫。

sentences.english: Remember when your teacher told you to stop doodling in class?
sentences.chinese: 可曾記得你的老師叫你不要再在課堂上亂寫亂畫？

sentences.english: Stop vandalism. Don't scribble on walls.
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁破壞公物，禁止在牆上亂寫亂畫。

sentences.english: We paint the scratching on the wall out.
sentences.chinese: 我們用油漆塗去牆上亂畫的東西。

definition: to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
start explaining and it's a long story (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
